about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure in Rolling Bombs, a 3D platformer set in the enchanting yet perilous land of Boomerland. With an explosive gameplay, vibrant environments, and challenging mechanics, this game will keep you rolling with excitement!

From dodging enemy bombs to navigating molten lava lakes, every moment in Rolling Bombs is packed with challenges that will test your wits and reflexes. Whether you’re planning your level escape or perfecting your skills in time-based challenges, there’s always a reason to jump back in and play again.

Features:

🕹️ Time-Based Levels + Boss Fights
Dive into a variety of detailed levels, full of secrets to unveil and coins to collect, each more thrilling and challenging than the last, with some epic boss battles that will test your mettle.

⏳ Race Against Time
In each level, the clock is ticking since the fuse has been lit. Can you find your way to the magical well before it’s too late?

🎮 Challenge Mode
Prove your worth in Challenge Mode! Race to complete the boomerland temple in record time, to secure your place as the ultimate Boomer Hero.

🔄 Replayable Levels
Level Select Mode lets you revisit any level you’ve unlocked. Replay your favorites, beat your previous records, or unveil some hidden surprises.

💎 Hidden Gems
Explore each level to discover hidden gems! Collecting these treasures unlocks new playable Boomers, each with unique attributes. Can you find them all and unleash the full army of Boomers?!

🤖 Dynamic Enemies & Environmental Traps
Prepare to face cunning foes and devious traps that challenge both your reflexes and strategy. Stay focus, dodge danger, and remember: one wrong move could lead to an explosive end!

☀️ Stylized Cel-Shading Visuals
Enjoy stunning sunsets, detailed environments, and mesmerizing visual effects that bring Boomerland to life.

🎯 Achievements
Unlock Steam Achievements as you progress through the game, showcasing your skills and dedication to become a Grand Master Boomer!

Why You’ll Love Rolling Bombs:

Whether you’re a fan of classic 3D platformers or looking for a fresh, modern take on the genre, Rolling Bombs offers something for everyone. The game focuses on you learning the rolling mechanics to improve your skills rather than relying on “leveling up” or “ability points”.

The perfect mix of fast-paced action, strategic gameplay, and a dash of humor makes this an unforgettable experience. From tackling boss fights to discovering secrets and new locations, every roll will be a new adventure.

Note from The Developer

This game was made entirely by one person, me (Hi, I'm Rob!). I spent the last 2 years working on this project. Personally, I'm a fan of games that feels initially really difficult but then become almost easy once you really get the hang of it.

It is following this spirit I designed Rolling Bombs. If you decide to purchase a copy, I thank you for supporting this project and I hope that you'll enjoy this challenging game. Remember ... should you find yourself frustrated, never give up! The clock is ticking, and the world is waiting for its hero.

Let’s roll into this journey together! 💣

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 900 series, equivalent or better.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The provided requirements are an estimation, the game might not run as intended on old hardware.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 20 series, equivalent or better.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The provided requirements are an estimation, the game might not run as intended on old hardware.

short_description: Master rolling mechanics in this action-packed 3D platformer! Collect coins, uncover secrets, and conquer epic bosses across time-based levels. Test your skills in dynamic environments, harness powerful abilities, and race to save the magical world of Boomerland from impending doom.
